info.title: HHS Media Services
info.description:
Common Features / Behaviors

  • * "sort" param: supports multi column sorting through the use of commas as delimiters, and a hyphen to denote descending order.
    Examples:
    • namesort results by name ascending
    • -namesort results by name descending
    • -name,idsort results by name descending and then by id ascending
    • id,-dateContentAuthoredsort results by id ascending and then date descending

get.description: Returns the list of Resources matching the search query 'q'.The search query 'q' is a Lucene query.The syntax for a Lucene query can be found here.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search query supplied by the user

get.description: Returns the list of MediaItems matching the specified query parameters.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset of the records set to return for pagination

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: * Set of fields to sort the records by.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: * The ascending or descending order.

parameters.name: mediaTypes
parameters.description: Find all media items belonging to the specified media type[s].

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Find all media items containing the provided name, case insensitive.

parameters.name: collectionId
parameters.description: Restrict filtering to media items in a specific collection.

parameters.name: nameContains
parameters.description: Find all media items containing the partial name, case insensitive.

parameters.name: descriptionContains
parameters.description: Find all media items containing the provided partial description, case insensitive.

parameters.name: sourceUrl
parameters.description: Find all media items which have the provided sourceUrl, case insensitive.

parameters.name: sourceUrlContains
parameters.description: Find all media items which contain the provided partial sourceUrl, case insensitive.

parameters.name: customThumbnailUrl
parameters.description: Find all media items which have the provided customThumbnailUrl, case insensitive.

parameters.name: customThumbnailUrlContains
parameters.description: Find all media items which contain the provided partial customThumbnailUrl, case insensitive.

parameters.name: dateContentAuthored
parameters.description: Find all media items authored on the provided day (RFC 3339, time ignored).

parameters.name: dateContentUpdated
parameters.description: Find all media items updated on the provided day (RFC 3339, time ignored).

parameters.name: dateContentPublished
parameters.description: Find all media items published on the provided day (RFC 3339, time ignored).

parameters.name: dateContentReviewed
parameters.description: Find all media items reviewed on the provided day (RFC 3339, time ignored).

parameters.name: dateSyndicationCaptured
parameters.description: Find all media items authored on the provided day (RFC 3339, time ignored).

parameters.name: dateSyndicationUpdated
parameters.description: Find all media items updated on the provided day, (RFC 3339, time ignored).

parameters.name: contentAuthoredSinceDate
parameters.description: Find all media items authored since the provided day (RFC 3339, time ignored).

parameters.name: contentAuthoredBeforeDate
parameters.description: Find all media items authored before the provided day (RFC 3339, time ignored).

parameters.name: contentAuthoredInRange
parameters.description: Find all media items authored between the provided start and end days (RFC 3339, comma separated, time ignored).

parameters.name: contentUpdatedSinceDate
parameters.description: Find all media items updated since the provided day (RFC 3339, time ignored).

parameters.name: contentUpdatedBeforeDate
parameters.description: Find all media items updated before the provided day (RFC 3339, time ignored).

parameters.name: contentUpdatedInRange
parameters.description: Find all media items updated between the provided start and end days (RFC 3339, comma separated, time ignored).

parameters.name: contentPublishedSinceDate
parameters.description: Find all media items published since the provided day (RFC 3339, time ignored).

parameters.name: contentPublishedBeforeDate
parameters.description: Find all media items published before the provided day (RFC 3339, time ignored).

parameters.name: contentPublishedInRange
parameters.description: Find all media items published between the provided start and end days (RFC 3339, comma separated, time ignored).

parameters.name: contentReviewedSinceDate
parameters.description: Find all media items reviewed since the provided day (RFC 3339, time ignored).

parameters.name: contentReviewedBeforeDate
parameters.description: Find all media items reviewed before the provided day (RFC 3339, time ignored).

parameters.name: contentReviewedInRange
parameters.description: Find all media items reviewed between the provided start and end days (RFC 3339, comma separated, time ignored).

parameters.name: syndicationCapturedSinceDate
parameters.description: Find all media items authored since the provided day (RFC 3339, time ignored).

parameters.name: syndicationCapturedBeforeDate
parameters.description: Find all media items authored before the provided day (RFC 3339, time ignored).

parameters.name: syndicationCapturedInRange
parameters.description: Find all media items authored between the provided start and end days (RFC 3339, comma separated, time ignored).

parameters.name: syndicationUpdatedSinceDate
parameters.description: Find all media items updated since the provided day, (RFC 3339, time ignored).

parameters.name: syndicationUpdatedBeforeDate
parameters.description: Find all media items updated before the provided day, (RFC 3339, time ignored).

parameters.name: syndicationUpdatedInRange
parameters.description: Find all media items updated between the provided start and end days, (RFC 3339, comma separated, time ignored).

parameters.name: syndicationVisibleSinceDate
parameters.description: Find all media items visible since the provided day, (RFC 3339, time ignored).

parameters.name: syndicationVisibleBeforeDate
parameters.description: Find all media items visible before the provided day, (RFC 3339, time ignored).

parameters.name: syndicationVisibleInRange
parameters.description: Find all media items visible between the provided start and end days, (RFC 3339, comma separated, time ignored).

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description: Find all media items written in the language specified by Id.

parameters.name: languageName
parameters.description: Find all media items written in the language specified by name, case insensitive.

parameters.name: languageIsoCode
parameters.description: Find all media items written in the language specified by 639-2 isoCode , case insensitive.

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: Find all media items which match the provided hash, case insensitive.

parameters.name: hashContains
parameters.description: Find all media items which match the provided partial hash, case insensitive.

parameters.name: sourceId
parameters.description: Find all media items that belong to the source specified by Id.

parameters.name: sourceName
parameters.description: Find all media items that belong to the source specified by name, case insensitive.

parameters.name: sourceNameContains
parameters.description: Find all media items that belong to the source specified by partial name, case insensitive.

parameters.name: sourceAcronym
parameters.description: Find all media items that belong to the source specified by acronym, case insensitive.

parameters.name: sourceAcronymContains
parameters.description: Find all media items that belong to the source specified by partial acronym, case insensitive.

parameters.name: tagIds
parameters.description: Find only media items tagged with the specified tag Ids.

parameters.name: restrictToSet
parameters.description: Find only media from within the supplied list of Ids.

parameters.name: createdBy
parameters.description: Find all media items containing the createdBy value.

get.description: Returns the javascript or iframe embed code for the MediaItem identified by 'id'.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the record to look up

parameters.name: flavor
parameters.description: Currently supports 'iframe', defaults to 'javascript'.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The width of the generated iframe.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height of the generated iframe.

parameters.name: iframeName
parameters.description: The name of the iframe element

parameters.name: excludeJquery
parameters.description: Should a reference to the JQuery Library be omitted?

parameters.name: excludeDiv
parameters.description: Should the div to insert content into be omitted?

parameters.name: divId
parameters.description: Should the div to insert content into have a specific name?

parameters.name: displayMethod
parameters.description: Method used to render an html request. Accepts one: [mv, list, feed]

get.description: Returns the syndicated content for a given MediaItem in the specified 'format' (HTML or JSON).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the record to look up

parameters.name: cssClass
parameters.description: The css class to target for extraction.

parameters.name: stripStyles
parameters.description: Remove in-line styles from content.

parameters.name: stripScripts
parameters.description: Remove script tags from content.

parameters.name: stripImages
parameters.description: Remove image tags from content.

parameters.name: stripBreaks
parameters.description: Remove break tags from content.

parameters.name: stripClasses
parameters.description: Remove class attributes from content (except 'syndicate').

parameters.name: font
parameters.description: Set font size (in points) of p, div, and span tags.

parameters.name: imageFloat
parameters.description: Accepts valid CSS float options, such as 'left' or 'right'. Will inject a style into the content before rendering.

parameters.name: imageMargin
parameters.description: Accepts 4 CSV values representing pixel sizes of margin similar to CSS. Default format is 'north,east,south,west' - for example '0,10,10,0' would put a 10 pixel margin on the right and bottom sides of an image. Will inject a style into the content before rendering.

parameters.name: autoplay
parameters.description: If content is a video, the embeded video will auto play when loaded.

parameters.name: rel
parameters.description: If content is a video, related items will be shown at the end of playback.
